entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character of the story, introduced as having had little contact with his cousin during the summer.

entities.name: dudley
entities.description: Dudley is Harry's cousin, who has been trying to express his feelings but appears to have exhausted them.

entities.name: privet drive
entities.description: Privet Drive is the location where Harry lives with his relatives.

relationships.description: Harry and Dudley are cousins, as described in the text.
Harry lives at Privet Drive with his relatives.
